articles.title: Samantha Ruth Prabhu shines in a red sequin saree and it is perfect for the wedding season - Times of India
articles.description: Samantha Ruth Prabhu embraces the season of love in a ruby red saree.
articles.content: For her glam makeup, Samantha opted for black kohl, smoky eye shadow, darkened brows, mascara-laden eyelashes, contoured cheeks, blushed cheeks and a shade of nude lipstick.
